name: Cavescape (itch) (X36Granitplate)
description:
Asteroid sighted in Stone Age, already hiding for protection. 



As a fellow Humanoid Reptile, you descend deep in a cave with nothing but danger but also, a magical place to witness, in order protect yourself from the impact of the asteroid. Now your only task is to escape the cave.



Learn abilities that will help you overcome the danger that awaits in the cave, and loot shiny crystals that shall behold an additional visual event, so look around carefully.





Dash in the direction you are moving with through the cave to overcome
many dangerous parkours.





Learn the ability to dash in between multiple glowing crystals to elevate for 3 seconds. During that time, you can repeatedly press the input key to dash in the direction you are facing with the camera. 
Overcome even the highest grounds!













Face the biggest challenge the crystal cave offers you if you wish to
escape alive.


This is a solo project created within the third semester under the Game Creation Education: "HTK Academy", using Unreal Engine 5.
